description.translate: It's not just thinking	that causes headaches.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Casse-tête\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Il n'y a pas que la réflexion\"}","{\"text\":\"§7qui cause des mots de têtes.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7It's not just thinking\"}","{\"text\":\"§7that causes headaches.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7HAS§a1 §7SPD§c-2\"}"]}}
